author: vors
body:
<!-- PR checklist -->
- [x] Partially addresses issue #1455.
- [x] Code is up-to-date with `master`.
- [ ] Add tests that fail without your changes.
- [x] Update all relevant [documentation](../docs).

<!-- Provide more details about the PR below -->

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body:
Eh, fair enough since we already committed the token, and its whole purpose is to get around the fact that our repo is private. So if you can see the repo (and thus the token) you already have access to what the token would provide.

I'm good with this.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: It also means we can do an in-place fix for download.sh for when the repo goes public (and the assets become so much more easy to access).

title: Move GITHUB_TOKEN in tools/download.sh
